extends Object
    Test class for PercentLayout.

      Tests alignment of a component if the alignment is START.

      Tests if the weight factors are correctly applied.

      Tests the behavior of applyWeightFactors() if there is no remaining space.

      Tests the behavior of applyWeightFactors() if no weight factors have been set.

      Tests whether the start positions of cells are correctly calculated.
      void testCalcCellSizesColumnsGroups()
      Tests whether column groups are taken into account.
      void testCalcCellSizesColumnsMinimum()
      Tests calculation of the column sizes if the minimum width is used.
      void testCalcCellSizesColumnsPreferred()
      Tests calculation of the column sizes if the preferred width is used.
      void testCalcCellSizesMultiSpanEnlarge()
      Tests a multi span component that requires enlargement of cells.
      void testCalcCellSizesRowsGroups()
      Tests whether row groups are taken into account.
      void testCalcCellSizesRowsMinimum()
      Tests calculation of the row sizes if the minimum height is used.
      void testCalcCellSizesRowsPreferred()
      Tests calculation of the row sizes if the preferred height is used.
      void testCalcComponentSizeSizeNone()
      Tests calcComponentSize() if the size is set to NONE.
      void testCalcMinimumLayoutSizeCanShrink()
      Tests whether the minimum layout size can be calculated if shrinking is allowed.
      void testCalcMinimumLayoutSizeMinimum()
      Tests whether the preferred layout size is correctly calculated if the minimum size is used in cell constraints.
      void testCalcMinimumLayoutSizeNoShrink()
      Tests the behavior of calcMinimumLayoutSize() if shrinking is not allowed.
      void testCalcPreferredLayoutSizeGroups()
      Tests whether the preferred layout size can be determined if cell groups are involved.
      void testCalcPreferredLayoutSizePreferred()
      Tests whether the preferred layout size is correctly calculated if the preferred size is used in cell constraints.
      void testCalcSizesAdditionalSpace()
      Tests whether cell sizes are enlarged if more space becomes available.
      void testCalcSizesExactSize()
      Tests the calculation of the cell sizes if the container size matches the preferred size.
      void testCalcSizesLessSpaceNoShrink()
      Tests the calculation of cell sizes if not enough space is available, but shrinking is disabled.
      void testCalcSizesLessSpaceShrink()
      Tests the calculation of cell sizes if not enough space is available and shrinking is allowed.
      void testCalcSizesLessSpaceThanMinimum()
      Tests the calculation of cell sizes if the available space does not satisfy the minimum space requirements.
      void testCheckConstraintsColumnTooBig()
      Tests a layout with a component whose X coordinates are too big.
      void testCheckConstraintsInvalidObject()
      Tests the checkConstraints() method if an invalid constraints object is passed.
      void testCheckConstraintsRowTooBig()
      Tests a layout with a component whose Y coordinates are too big.
      void testFetchPlatformAdapterUndefined()
      Tries to obtain the platform adapter if it has not yet been set.
      void testFlushCacheMultiComponents()
      Tests whether flushCache() also affects the multi components.
      void testGetAllColumnConstraintsModify()
      Tests whether a defensive copy of the array of column constraints is returned.
      void testGetAllRowConstraintsModify()
      Tests whether a defensive copy of the array of row constraints is returned.
      void testGetColumnGroupsEmpty()
      Tests the getColumnGroups() method if there are no groups.
      void testGetColumnGroupsModify()
      Tries to modify the collection with column groups.
      void testGetColumnGroupsMultiple()
      Tests getColumnGroups() if multiple groups have been added.

      Tests whether the minimum component size is correctly obtained from the platform adapter.

      Tests whether the preferred component size is correctly obtained from the platform adapter.

      Tests the getRowGroups() method if there are no groups.

      Tries to modify the collection with row groups.

      Tests getRowGroups() if multiple groups have been added.

      Tests whether the total weight factor X is correctly calculated.

      Tests whether the total weight factor Y is correctly calculated.

      Tests a multi-span component that cannot be enlarged due to constraints.

      Tries to pass an invalid string specification to the layout.

      Tests initialization using strings.

      Tries to create a layout with a null string for the columns.

        public void testPerformLayout()
